editorialNotes.short: Help yourself resist distractions from your device.

editorialNotes.tagline: The tools for your first draft

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task managerand Things is adaptable enough for anyone. This Apple Design Award winner is crisp and lightweight, featuring a simple but effective interface. The ever-present Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app, and organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them. Its like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.
editorialNotes.short: Organize class projects, assignments and daily to-do lists.
Solve complex maths operations with your handwriting.

editorialNotes.standard: This writing app is designed to let you type without distraction. Key features weve come to depend on include the customizable keyboard, iCloud sync, and its streamlined interface for easy document preview and access.
editorialNotes.short: A streamlined interface with a customisable keyboard, iCloud sync and more.

ios.subtitle: PHOTO to PDF JPG GIF PNG HEIC

name: Chore Pad: Chores & Rewards, Beautifully Themed

ios.subtitle: Like pen on paper, only better
Print to printers, old and new
View & Edit all kinds of docs

editorialNotes.short: Create a mind map wherever you are and whenever you want.

editorialNotes.standard: Protect private information your way in OneSafes versatile digital vault. Industrial-strength encryption lets you secure financial details, logins, documents and moreeven scanned credit cardswith a single PIN, password or a drawn pattern. Accessing data is a snap thanks to easy organisation and seamless syncing across devices. Complete with Safari integration and automatic strong password creation, OneSafe is the right kind of security toolthe kind youll want to use every day.
